text: The 8th Korfball World Championship was held in Brno (Czech Republic) on November 1–10, 2007 with 16 national teams in competition. The best 8 teams qualified for the World Games 2009 in Kaohsiung, Chinese Taipei. These days was also played the final match of the European Bowl with the champions of the Eastern and Western divisions, Slovakia and Wales. ==Teams== {| width="100%" align=center |valign="top" width="22%"| {| align=center cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="background: #D0E7FF;
